content:
I see the home page for the build has significantly changed. I am not sure what changed in the underlying structure, however it seems that the iglist page is inaccessible. There used to be a link on the home page to "Implementation guides". That link is no longer available. I cannot find it in numerous places I looked. When I hand enter the URL, the breadcrumbs at the top of the list indicate there is an issue.
Hand entered URL: http://hl7-fhir.github.io/iglist.html
breadcrumbs: Home ??? iglist.html / page
Section title: ?.? Implementation Guides defined as part of FHIR
it's still available under Implementation,.. implementation guides, but it is being phased out, yes
